weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: A simple, easily concealed blade. Can be thrown in a pinch.

weapons.name: Sword
weapons.description: A balanced and reliable blade. Can be wielded with one or two hands.

weapons.name: Runeblade
weapons.description: A light blade etched with runes that channel the wielder's mental energy, guided by intellect and arcane will.

weapons.name: Greatsword
weapons.description: A massive, heavy blade that requires two hands and significant strength to wield effectively.

weapons.name: Spear
weapons.description: A long polearm that can keep enemies at a distance.

weapons.name: Heavy Club
weapons.description: A heavy, simple weapon for bludgeoning foes.

weapons.name: Warhammer
weapons.description: A massive, two-handed hammer designed to shatter armor and fortifications.

weapons.name: Gauntlets
weapons.description: Armored gloves for brutal, close-quarters fighting.

weapons.name: Whip
weapons.description: A flexible weapon that can be used to trip and entangle foes from a distance.

weapons.name: Battle Rings
weapons.description: Light, bladed rings used for swift, elegant, and inspiring combat.

weapons.name: Shortbow
weapons.description: A light, versatile bow, suitable for skirmishing.

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.description: A powerful bow for a dedicated archer, capable of hitting targets at a great distance.

weapons.name: Composite Bow
weapons.description: A reinforced bow that requires significant strength to draw, but offers incredible power.

weapons.name: Crossbow
weapons.description: A powerful, armor-piercing ranged weapon that requires time to reload.

weapons.name: Sling
weapons.description: A simple leather sling for hurling stones.

weapons.name: Boomerang
weapons.description: A curved throwing weapon that returns to the wielder's hand.

weapons.name: Crystal Shard Blade
weapons.description: A dagger made from a shard of the pulsating Crystal Spire. Once per day, its wielder can cause it to flare with power, dealing extra harm.

weapons.name: Void-Kissed Blade
weapons.description: A dark, obsidian dagger imbued with Void energy. On a critical hit, the target is afflicted with a debilitating, supernatural chill.

weapons.name: Whisperfang Daggers
weapons.description: A pair of daggers forged with void-touched metal. When they strike true, they seem to steal the sound from their victim's throat.

weapons.name: Blade of the Zephyr
weapons.description: A lightweight sword crafted in Wyndia that feels almost weightless. It allows the wielder to strike with impossible speed.

weapons.name: Sunstone Blade
weapons.description: A blade forged with a sunstone core. Once per scene, its wielder can command it to unleash a blinding flash of light, disorienting a foe.

weapons.name: Earth-Wrought Blade
weapons.description: A greatsword of blackened steel with swirling crystalline veins. It grants the wearer a +1 bonus to all Force checks.

weapons.name: Dragon's Tooth
weapons.description: A colossal blade carved from the tooth of an ancient dragon. It resonates with Rya's power, dealing extra harm of her currently attuned element.

weapons.name: Blade of the Unending Storm
weapons.description: A colossal blade that crackles with contained lightning. On a successful hit, you can choose to deal 1 less harm to unleash a peal of thunder, disorienting all nearby enemies.

weapons.name: Sunforged Spear
weapons.description: The tip of this spear glows with a faint, warm light. It deals holy damage, which is anathema to the undead and creatures of the void.

weapons.name: Harvester's Pike
weapons.description: A grim-looking spear with a wicked, barbed tip. When you deal harm with it, the wound bleeds profusely, causing the target to take additional harm on their next turn.

weapons.name: Piercing Gale
weapons.description: A lightweight spear with a tip of enchanted, hardened air. It ignores 1 point of the target's armor.

weapons.name: Stonemason's Maul
weapons.description: A warhammer used in the construction of Stonegard. Once per day, it can be used to cast a move as if you were Rya with the Earth lineage attuned.

weapons.name: The Tyrant's Gavel
weapons.description: A fearsome warhammer that emits an aura of dread. When you Intimidate someone while holding it, you can use Force instead of Heart.

weapons.name: Golem-Wrecker
weapons.description: A hammer inscribed with runes of unmaking. It is brutally effective against constructs, dealing +2 harm to them.

weapons.name: Grasping Gauntlets
weapons.description: These iron gauntlets are etched with runes of binding. When you strike a foe, you may immediately attempt to grapple them as a free action.

weapons.name: Gauntlets of the Stone Titan
weapons.description: Massive stone gauntlets. When you Wreck something while wearing them, treat your roll as one category higher.

weapons.name: Stormvine Whip
weapons.description: A living whip braided from storm-infused vines. On a critical hit, the vines instinctively lash out, attempting to grapple the target.

weapons.name: Grasping Ivy
weapons.description: A legendary whip grown from a cutting of the purified Gloomwood Heart. It can be used to command nearby plants to ensnare a foe.

weapons.name: Wyndian Quill Bow
weapons.description: A finely crafted shortbow that hums with wind magic. Arrows fired from it crackle with lightning.

weapons.name: Bow of the Silent Watcher
weapons.description: A darkwood bow that makes no sound when fired. When you attack from hiding with this bow, you do not reveal your position on a miss.

weapons.name: Heartwood Longbow
weapons.description: A longbow carved from the heartwood of an ancient tree. It guides the archer's hand, granting a +1 bonus to Finesse when making a Called Shot.

weapons.name: The Sky-Piercer
weapons.description: A bow crafted by the Skyveil to hunt armored mountain beasts. Arrows fired from it ignore 1 point of armor.

weapons.name: Soulstring Bow
weapons.description: A bow strung with a strand of a wraith's essence. Its arrows are guided by the wielder's intellect to seek their target's life force.

weapons.name: Inquisitor's Crossbow
weapons.description: A heavy crossbow used by the Champions of Order. Its bolts are imbued with holy energy.

weapons.name: The Viper's Kiss
weapons.description: A crossbow with a sickly green-black wood stock. Its bolts magically carry a debilitating poison.

armor_and_shields.name: Gambeson
armor_and_shields.description: Padded cloth armor that offers basic protection.

armor_and_shields.name: Studded Leather
armor_and_shields.description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs.

armor_and_shields.name: Scale Mail
armor_and_shields.description: A suit of overlapping metal scales.

armor_and_shields.name: Heavy Shield
armor_and_shields.description: A large, sturdy shield that grants a bonus when you Stand Guard.

armor_and_shields.name: Whisper-weave Tunic
armor_and_shields.description: A tunic woven with the silk of a Gloomfang Spider, enchanted to muffle sound. It negates the 'Noisy' tag from other pieces of armor.

armor_and_shields.name: Stone-Skin Vest
armor_and_shields.description: A leather tunic reinforced with plates of rock from Scalebound territory. It fills the wearer with the resilience of the mountain, making them feel stronger.

armor_and_shields.name: Shadowpelt Jerkin
armor_and_shields.description: Armor made from the cured hide of a Shadowpelt beast. It is enchanted to move silently, negating the usual penalties for wearing armor when being stealthy.

armor_and_shields.name: Wyvern Scale Vest
armor_and_shields.description: A vest of tough, interlocking wyvern scales. It provides excellent protection and grants the wearer resistance to poisons.

armor_and_shields.name: Ember-Scale Armor
armor_and_shields.description: A powerful suit of armor forged from the scales of a Cinder-Scale Tyrant. The wearer is immune to fire damage.

armor_and_shields.name: Bulwark of the Old Guard
armor_and_shields.description: Masterwork plate armor from a bygone era. It is so well-balanced that it does not have the 'Clumsy' tag.

armor_and_shields.name: Bulwark of the Gatewarden
armor_and_shields.description: A massive shield in the style of the Stonekin Gatewardens. When you use it to Stand Guard, you are considered an immovable object and cannot be pushed back.

armor_and_shields.name: Stone-Forged Aegis
armor_and_shields.description: A shield of pure mountain stone, imbued with a ward of divine light. It provides exceptional protection against hostile magic.

armor_and_shields.name: Mirage Mail
armor_and_shields.description: A suit of shimmering chainmail that bends the light around it. Once per scene, when you take harm, you can create a perfect illusory duplicate of yourself to confuse your enemies.

armor_and_shields.name: Aegis of the Stalwart
armor_and_shields.description: A heavy shield that can absorb a single, devastating blow. Once per adventure, you can declare that an attack against you deals no harm.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Adventurer's Kit
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A backpack containing a bedroll, a mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, and a waterskin.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Rope (50 ft.)
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A sturdy length of hemp rope.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Healing Salve
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you apply this salve to a wounded creature, they heal 2 Harm.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Herbal Poultice
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you apply this, you or an ally can heal 1 Harm, but it takes your whole turn to prepare and use.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Smoke Bomb
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A clay sphere packed with alchemical reagents.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you throw this, it creates a thick cloud of smoke, providing cover and a chance to escape or reposition.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Bandages
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A roll of clean cloth for first aid.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you take a few moments to apply these, you can help an ally who has been taken out of a scene. They are no longer dying, but remain unconscious.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Elderwood Poultice
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A thick, earthy paste that grants a temporary +1 Armor for a scene.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Sun-Kissed Petal
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A rare flower from the Azure Steppes that glows with a soft light.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you consume this petal, you may clear 1 Harm and ask the GM a single question about your immediate future, which will be answered with a cryptic but truthful omen.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Moon Drop
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A vial of liquid that shimmers like the night sky.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you drink this, you heal 1 Harm and may remove one mental effect (like fear, confusion, or magical influence).

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Firecracker
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A tightly wrapped paper tube with a runic fuse.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you throw this, you deal 1-harm (ap, fire) to all nearby enemies and put them in a bad spot.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Dragon Scale
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A single, perfectly formed scale from an ancient dragon, humming with latent power.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you crush this scale, its magic is released. You gain +1 Armor for the rest of the scene.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Panacea
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A sparkling, effervescent liquid that seems to cure any ailment.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you drink this, you are immediately cleared of all negative physical and magical effects.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Elixir of Might
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A thick, crimson liquid that temporarily enhances physical power.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you drink this, your muscles surge with power. For the rest of the scene, your attacks deal +1 harm.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Draught of Haste
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A shimmering, silver liquid that seems to vibrate with energy.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you drink this, you are filled with impossible speed. You may immediately take an extra action.

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Ghost Pepper
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A small, pale white pepper that is shockingly spicy.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you eat this, your mouth is filled with magical fire. For the next few moments, you can breathe a short cone of flame that deals 1-harm (fire).

adventuring_gear_and_consumables.name: Stone-Skin Potion
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.description: A gritty, gray liquid that hardens the skin.
adventuring_gear_and_consumables.move: When you drink this, your skin takes on a stone-like quality. You gain +1 Armor for the rest of the scene.

tag_glossary.description: Armor Piercing. This attack is particularly effective against armored foes.
Designed for unarmed combat.
This shield is large enough to brace against a charge. When you Stand Guard with it, you cannot be easily moved.
This armor is heavy and ill-fitting. Take a -1 penalty to all Finesse rolls.
This weapon dazes opponents. On a successful hit, your target is put in a bad spot.
This weapon is simple and poorly balanced.
This weapon is effective at long range.
This weapon relies on agility and precision. You can use Finesse instead of Force to Engage in Battle with it.
This weapon requires strength to wield effectively. You cannot use Finesse to Engage in Battle with it.
This weapon can be used to grab or entangle. You can use it to restrain a foe.
This armor is cumbersome. It may hinder certain actions.
This item is small and easy to conceal.
This item is imbued with magical energy. Its effects may bypass normal resistances.
Standard armor that balances protection and mobility.
A weapon used in close-quarters combat.
This armor makes a lot of noise. Take a -1 penalty to all Prowl rolls.
A set of two weapons. When you Engage in Battle with both, you deal +1 harm.
A weapon used from a distance.
This melee weapon is long. You can attack enemies from a safe distance.
This weapon requires an action to reload after being fired.
This thrown weapon returns to your hand after an attack.
This weapon is exceptionally good at destroying structures.
This melee weapon can be thrown at a nearby target.
This weapon requires two hands to wield effectively.
This weapon can be used with one or two hands. When used with two hands, it gains the 'Forceful' tag.
